content.question: The choice of traditional subject matter for the illustrated manuscript of the Shahnama completed under the direction of Shah Tahmasp in c. 1522-1525 C.E. demonstrates the

choices.label: use of propaganda to draw attention to the accomplishments of his own reign
awareness of Persian cultural identity expressed through Firdausi’s epic poem
fundamental misunderstanding of myths and legends passed down over time
attempt to connect Islamic teachings to the religious practices of ancient Persia

content.answer: awareness of Persian cultural identity expressed through Firdausi’s epic poem
